Class BicycleSKU

java.lang.Object
BicycleSKU
public class BicycleSKU
extends java.lang.Object
This class contains fields and methods with which information about a bicycle and the materials and components comprising that bicycle can be maintained and manipulated.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description

    This version of the constructor expects no fewer than ten arguments, the values of which used to initialize its instance variables.

  • Constructor Details

    • BicycleSKU

      public BicycleSKU()
      This is the version of the constructor called when an object of this type is instantiated without arguments.

    • BicycleSKU

      public BicycleSKU​(java.lang.String manufacturer, java.lang.String model, java.lang.String color, java.lang.String frameset, java.lang.String fork, java.lang.String wheels, java.lang.String drivetrain, double weight, double price, int quantity)
      This version of the constructor expects no fewer than ten arguments, the values of which used to initialize its instance variables.
      Parameters:
      manufacturer - a String containing the manufacturer's name
      model - a String containing the model name
      color - a String containing bicycle's color
      frameset - a String describing the frame set
      fork - a String describing the fork
      wheels - a String describing the wheelset
      drivetrain - a String describing the drivetrain
      weight - a floating-point number (type double) specifying the bicycle's weight
      price - a floating-point number (type double) specifying the bicycle's price
      quantity - a whole number (type int) the total quantity of this item
